subject: JUnit testing with Stubs
msgSnippet: Hi, I use JUnit to test methods that takes in object as its parameters.Now for testing those methods I instantiate those input objects and set its attributes
messageBody:
Hi,
I use JUnit to test methods that takes in object as its parameters.Now for testing those methods I instantiate those input objects and set its attributes in the test class before testing the test method. Is there any way of constructing the objects at runtime from stubs (like XML stubs), So that I need not hard code the object's attributes in my test class.

Thanks in advance
Selvakumar T
